explains: n. [贸易] 市场商人；市场营销人员

sentences.en: A marketer may re-position the product to appeal to new market sections.
sentences.cn: 市场营销人员可以重新定位产品，以吸引其他新的市场。

sentences.en: As a marketer I understood what makes people buy things.
sentences.cn: 作为一个生意人，我知道如何让人们买东西。

sentences.en: Not what a marketer wants you to drink!
sentences.cn: 而不是哪一类市场家让你去喝！
